downloadTitle: Advanced Payroll in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Advanced Payroll module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection:
​AudienceThis training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Advanced Payroll module in Microsoft Dynamics SL. At Training Material CompletionAfter reviewing this training, individuals will have:
  • Process certified payroll
  • Configure prevailing wages
  • Understand the integration of the Advanced Payroll and the Payroll module
  • Understand the integration of the Advanced Payroll and Time and Expense for Projects module
  • Process union wage rates, union deductions, and reporting
PrerequisitesBefore reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • General knowledge of Microsoft Windows
  • Knowledge of basic navigation functions in Microsoft Dynamics SL.
  • Completion of Payroll training course required.
